title: The Police State Is Here (Ep 1850)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking new moves by the deep state to intimidate and frighten team Trump. I also show disturbing video about digital currencies and how they plan to use them. 

News Picks:


If you can spare a few dollars, a former Secret Service colleague of mine needs help. 

Inflation comes in hotter than expected at 8.3% annual rate in August.

Is the polling wrong again? Here’s a possible explanation. 


Democrat Congressman Accuses Republican Of Stealing Election Away From Him.


Majority of voters say 'less likely' to support candidates pushing student loan forgiveness, survey.

College Board AP African American Studies Course Teaches Critical Race Theory.
